CardHandsList.Heading: Card Hands
CardHandsList.DefaultsMessage: Set the default card draw options for {name}

ObserverLevel.Name: Include Hands with Observer Ownership
ObserverLevel.Hint: Includes hands of which users have Observer-level ownership. Default is Owner-level ownership only.

MinimalUIBehavior.Name: Minimal UI Module Behavior
MinimalUIBehavior.Hint: Set the interaction behavior pattern for the Card Hands list when using Minimal UI.
